✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple, straightforward, and solvable.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The problem is very clear and the problem is highly interesting

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: i remember this puzzle.... this is a good puzzle with recursion approach. i did it before.

i try it with brute force.... works until Validator 6, then i try with a recursion works until Validator 7.... but then i try with a a smarter recursion and it works great..... the only suggestion i have is to add a Recursion Tag.

Constraints
* Please change "[[s]]" to "length of [[s]]".

Cover picture
* Suggest to upload a cover picture for the puzzle.

Thanks.
